content.rendered:
Call Recording

Capture your calls

The Dolby.io Call Recording API supports video recordings up to 1080p, audio recordings, screen sharing, and dynamic layouts. Capture your meetings as they happen and export them for additional use.

Features

Call Recording

Screen capture and media download

Record media captured by participants’ cameras and microphones, and all media shared during a conference, including shared files and screens. Download audio-only or video recordings captured in 1080p with Dolby Voice®.

Spatial audio

Don’t worry about missing a live conference or event. Dolby.io Spatial Audio brings your audio and video recordings to life, allowing you to engage with recorded content for a more natural and lifelike listening experience.

Learn more

Customizable layouts

Fully customize the presentation of your recordings, including video, screen sharing, and any other information, with dynamic layouts to fit your use case. All using technologies you are familiar with (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).

Monitor conference activity

Capture details about your meetings and participants as they happen in real-time. REST APIs provide diagnostics to ensure a high quality of service and can retrieve recordings.

Discrete audio streams

Recordings can be combined into a single mix or stored as separate audio tracks for each participant.

Webhooks and storage

With a Dolby.io developer account you already have access to the recording feature. Recordings can be generated and stored for up to 180 days. You can enable webhooks to build integrations once a recording is ready.

Developer Platform

Developer Resources

Public docs

Learn from our getting started guides, tutorials, how-to articles, and interactive API reference explorer.

Sample projects

Start with one of the open-source sample projects on GitHub to accelerate building your application.

Self-service dashboard

  • Create and manage your application API Keys.
  • Monitor account usage, billing, subscription plans, and invoices.
  • Manage access for your team with an enterprise account and get quick access to support.
Sign up for an account Sign up for an account

Documentation

Take me there

Developer blog

Read now

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Dolby.io gave us a very fast time to market. We started user testing within 5-8 weeks.

Arul Venkatachalam

CTO, MediGuru

Dolby.io stood out, really, from the perspective of giving us the power and the flexibility and the customizability that we needed to embed something intricately into our software suite and really give us that control that we needed.

Damon Ramsey

CEO & Co-Founder, InputHealth

Dolby.io’s features, the roadmap that Dolby provides, and the ease of integration enabled us to customize the solution for our constituents—all without sacrificing quality and at a cost that is beneficial.

Siva Nagalingam

CEO, MediGuru

Popular Use Cases

The possibilities are endless

Distribute content to absent attendees

Automate delivery of recordings to all participants.

Broadcast to another video platform

Make it possible to distribute content when using recorded sessions.

Archive important meetings

Integrate with your own storage solutions for archiving content.

Capture media for post-processing and editing

Build media processing workflows for distributing content.

Capture interviews

Combine with transcription or other services for knowledge management or content creation.

Record video testimonials

Delight your audience by capturing shareable moments.

Get started

Start building with audio and video APIs

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales
